## assertLessEqual() function

Assert `x <= y`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertLessEqual(x: number, y: number, message?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The ostensibly smaller or equal value. |
|  y | number | The ostensibly larger or equal value. |
|  message | string | Optional error message if the assertion does not hold. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
